official_title: To designate the Federal building which is to be constructed at 799 First Avenue in New York, New York, as the "Ronald H. Brown United States Mission to the United Nations Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building which is to be constructed at 799 First Avenue in New York, New York, as the Ronald H. Brown United States Mission to the United Nations Building.
